consistent. Have you had any stomach issues? A bit often now is last week. Also I'm still on that other diabetes pills, the pink one but I don't know how that's called.
clinician_insights: Possible conditions: Poor blood sugar control possibly due to inconsistent medication adherence or dietary choices.
Medication adherence issues: Patient struggles with timing of metformin and glipizide, often forgetting doses due to early shifts.
Key lifestyle factors: Diet includes high-carbohydrate foods (empanadas) and limited physical activity, with rare walks after dinner.
Next diagnostic steps: Schedule follow-up in two weeks to monitor blood sugar levels and discuss insulin initiation if needed.
